Literature.Title: Computational Design of Pore-Forming Peptides with Potent Antimicrobial and Anticancer Activities
Literature.Author: Deb R, Torres MDT, Boudný M, Koběrská M, Cappiello F, Popper M, Dvořáková Bendová K, Drabinová M, Hanáčková A, Jeannot K, Petřík M, Mangoni ML, Balíková Novotná G, Mráz M, de la Fuente-Nunez C, Vácha R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>50 µM,Human umbilical cord-derived mesenchymal cells UC-MSC:IC50=140 µM,Human dermal fibroblasts:IC50=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli TOP 10(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus carnosus CCM 4838T(MIC=>50µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=>60µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=>60µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=>60µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=>60µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=0.6µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>60µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>60µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli AIC221(MIC=12µM),Escherichia coli AIC222(MIC=12µM),Human renal carcinoma A498(IC50=20µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(IC50=97µM),Human kidney carcinoma Caki-1(IC50=23µM),Human prostate cancer DU145(IC50=60µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H460(IC50=>200µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT 116(IC50=79µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HCT-15(IC50=7.1µM),Human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60(IC50=7.2µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(IC50=6.4µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=70µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(IC50=61µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-435(IC50=190µM),Human lymphoblastic leukemia Molt-4(IC50=>200µM),Human epithelial carcinoma OVCAR-3(IC50=9µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=91µM),Human Myeloma cells RPMI-8226(IC50=5.6µM),Human ovarian adenocarcinoma SK-OV-3(IC50=110µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW620(IC50=140µM),Human breast cancer T47D(IC50=4.6µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=>200µM)
